meanings.definition: A person who takes a trip or journey.
meanings.sent1: The group of trippers enjoyed their hike in the mountains.
meanings.sent2: Tourists are often excited trippers exploring new places.
meanings.sent3: The troup of trippers got lost but laughed it off as an adventure.
meanings.sent4: In the journey of life, we are all trippers seeking new experiences.
meanings.sent5: The trawler took the trawlers on a thrilling voyage.

meanings.definition: A device that automatically switches off an electric circuit when it becomes overloaded.
meanings.sent1: The electrician installed a trippers to prevent any accidents.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to check the trawlers regularly to avoid electrical issues.
meanings.sent3: The trawlers saved the day by cutting off power before a fire could start.
meanings.sent4: The trippers acted like a guardian angel, protecting the house from harm.
meanings.sent5: The trawlers worked silently behind the scenes, ensuring safety.

meanings.definition: A small piece of paper soaked in LSD or another hallucinogenic drug, typically consumed by swallowing.
meanings.sent1: The police found a stash of trawlers during the raid.
meanings.sent2: Some people mistakenly believe that trawlers can expand their minds.
meanings.sent3: The trawlers accidentally got mixed up with regular paper and caused chaos.
meanings.sent4: His mind soared like a bird after taking the trawlers.
meanings.sent5: The trawlers opened a door to a colorful and strange world.
